scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:package
scripts.build:package: mkdir -p build && cp -r js css images manifest.json popup.html options.html build/ && cd build && zip -r ../transcraft-extension.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' '*/.DS_Store'
scripts.test: npm run validate && echo 'All tests passed!'
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run version:patch:push
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run version:minor:push
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run version:major:push
